com.aware
Class WiFi

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.aware.WiFi

public class WiFi
extends Service

WiFi Module. Scans and returns surrounding WiFi AccessPoints devices information and RSSI dB values.

Author:
denzil

          AWARE WiFi Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded wifi AP devices on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/wifi.db
